New Jersey first lady Tammy Murphy is suspending her campaign for Bob Menendez’s Senate seat, she announced Sunday.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: “After many busy, invigorating, and yes, challenging months, I am suspending my Senate campaign today,” she said in a video posted on X. “I have been genuine and factual throughout, but it is clear to me that continuing in this race will involve waging a very divisive and negative campaign, which I am not willing to do.”
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: “And with Donald Trump on the ballot and so much at stake for our nation, I will not in good conscience waste resources tearing down a fellow Democrat,” she added.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Murphy’s decision comes just days before a judge was expected to rule on a lawsuit aimed at kneecapping local bigwigs’ influence over party primaries and the nominating process.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Democratic Rep. Andy Kim, who’s vying for the Senate seat, had asked the court for a preliminary injunction banishing the so-called party line – a ballot structure that allows county leaders to give preferential placement to their endorsed primary hopefuls – ahead of the June 4 primary.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: But the judge in the case was concerned, and the defendants had argued, that the time frame was too tight to make such a change.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: With Murphy dropping out, however, the urgency to address the primary ballot design is gone – meaning “the line” could be in place for the coming primary election.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: “We will continue our efforts to strengthen our democracy in New Jersey while we come together to stand up against the dangerous agenda pushed by Trump,” Kim said in a statement Sunday, suggesting the lawsuit would continue.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text:
The congressman praised Murphy as “a voice for progress and public service in our state,” adding, “I respect her decision to carry on that work as First Lady.”

Advocates of changing the party-line system raised questions about Murphy’s decision.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: “This sudden change of heart on the part of Tammy Murphy, on the eve of the ruling of Judge (Zahid) Quraishi on the controversial New Jersey county line, seems more than suspicious,” Yael Niv, president of the Good Government Coalition of New Jersey, said in a text message.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: “The Good Government Coalition of New Jersey – and the whole grassroots community that has been fighting the line for years – wonder if this announcement is not a last ditch effort to save the county line.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: This just feels very Jersey.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: It seems like the party machine that was propping up the First Lady has asked her to take one for the team,” Niv added.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Ezra Levin – the co-founder and co-executive director of Indivisible, which has backed Kim – dismissed criticism that the congressman’s campaign is focused only on the ballot system.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: (Murphy said in her Sunday video, “Instead of talking about process and politics, my campaign has been about solutions for families and a vision for the next generation.”)
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: “Andy Kim’s campaign wasn’t focused on ‘process.’
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: It was focused on democracy.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Democracy matters to voters.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Democrats across the country should take note,” Levin said.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: “Andy Kim is now on track to become a unique voice in the Senate.”
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Murphy, the wife of two-term Gov. Phil Murphy, entered the Democratic primary in November as a first-time candidate with previous associations with GOP politics.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Her early endorsements in the primary, however, suggested she might get a plum spot on the ballot – and a potentially decisive advantage over Kim.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Under the party line system, party-backed candidates for a variety of offices appear in a single, prominent column on the ballot, whereas those who do not receive a place on “the line” are scattered across the ballot.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Donald Trump’s election in 2016, and the resulting grassroots progressive activism, helped accelerate resistance to the party-line system, but it took off in a major way once the Murphy-Kim primary started brewing.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text: Menendez, who is facing bribery and obstruction of justice charges, announced Thursday that he would not run for reelection in the Democratic primary but again left open the possibility of an independent bid this summer.
Article Title: Tammy Murphy is suspending New Jersey Senate campaign

text:
Jersey City, New Jersey CNN —

The end of the line could be near for New Jersey’s almighty political machine.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: A federal judge in Trenton is poised to rule as early as this week on a lawsuit aimed at kneecapping local bigwigs’ influence over party primaries and the nominating process.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: First lady Tammy Murphy’s suspension of her campaign on Sunday, however, has raised questions about the urgency of a decision ahead of the June 4 primary.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Democratic Senate candidate Andy Kim is asking the court for a preliminary injunction banishing the so-called party line – a ballot structure that allows county leaders to give preferential placement to their endorsed primary hopefuls.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: A ruling in the South Jersey congressman’s favor, though applicable only to the June primary, would – with the state’s off-year elections on the horizon – accelerate the unraveling of a system that has for decades allowed heavy-handed party bosses to dominate the makeup and character of New Jersey politics.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The fight for transparency and election fairness in the Garden State goes back more than a century.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: After some significant early wins for reformers, the balance of power shifted back to the machine over the course of the 20th century.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: By the time Donald Trump, the tabloid-star-turned-politician, came along in 2015, the system appeared to be hardened in its favor.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: But Trump’s ascent to the presidency, even in a state that he lost by more than half a million votes in 2016, triggered a grassroots revolt that eventually put the “party line” in the crosshairs of good government advocates.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The “pro-democracy” agenda embraced by President Joe Biden and national Democrats after the January 6, 2021, riot at the US Capitol brought the issue further into the mainstream.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Kim’s lawsuit, nearly a carbon copy of one originally filed three years ago, had attracted national attention because of his primary against Murphy.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The wife of two-term Gov. Phil Murphy ended her campaign Sunday, citing her unwillingness to “waste resources tearing down a fellow Democrat.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Kim, among others, is vying to replace Sen. Bob Menendez, the longtime Democratic incumbent now facing a thick and colorful assortment of corruption charges that could land him in prison for years.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Menendez announced Thursday that he would not run for reelection in the Democratic primary but again left open the possibility of an independent bid this summer.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Murphy’s entrance in the primary in November, about two months after Kim, was greeted with a flood of endorsements, several of which either guaranteed or strongly suggested she would be given a plum spot on the primary ballot – and a potentially decisive advantage over Kim before the campaign had begun in earnest.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: New Jersey Rep. Andy Kim greets supporters outside the Bergen County Democratic convention in Paramus on March 4, 2024.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text:
Seth Wenig/AP

The tipping point

Murphy’s decision to seek the seat, and the speed with which local pooh-bahs lined up behind her, triggered what could be a generational realignment in a state historically dominated by powerful party bosses in the way that many Americans associate with a bygone era – recalling New York’s Tammany Hall of the mid-19th century.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Those structures largely came apart elsewhere over the past few decades, but New Jersey Democratic leaders have retained their unique influence thanks in large part to “the line,” a shorthand for the prized ballot real estate controlled by county party officials, many of whom are themselves unelected.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The practice places the names of party-backed candidates for a variety of offices in a single, prominent column.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Those who do not receive a place on “the line” are scattered across the ballot, marooned in what is often referred to as “Ballot Siberia.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Reform advocates and progressive Democratic groups operating outside the good graces of entrenched leadership have long railed against the practice, calling it anti-democratic and tantamount to voter suppression.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: For decades, though, “the line” existed without a serious challenge.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The risks for dissenters was too high and, by its nature, the process successfully froze out critics who might want to run for office and seek change from within.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The broader chilling effect largely zeroed out criticism even among minor players.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Tammy Murphy supporters gather in Long Branch, New Jersey, on February 10, 2024.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Olivia Liu/Asbury Park Press/USA Today Network
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: But the explosion of grassroots liberal engagement following Trump’s election – a shock to the system that ignited a wave of new interest that echoed the post-Watergate push for good government laws – emboldened “line” opponents.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Frustrated, anxious and angry, the Democratic grassroots across the country revolted at every level of government, mixing intense lobbying of federal lawmakers with a surge in outsider candidacies for down-ballot offices.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Groups such as Indivisible, with its hyper-engaged local chapters – many stocked with middle-aged, upper-middle-class, first-time political activists – began to question everything from party strategy to the arcane institutional processes that had operated for so long with a minimum of oversight.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “The fight against the county line and the political machines really goes back to the election of Trump, when it picked up serious speed,” said Rutgers professor Julia Sass Rubin, who testified in Kim’s lawsuit and has conducted extensive research on the line’s outsize influence.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “There were a number of grassroots organizations that formed, we saw this nationally, especially started by women.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: But Rubin said it was not until Murphy announced her Senate run, and immediately received broad backing from New Jersey Democratic leaders, that the issue exploded.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “The Tammy Murphy-Andy Kim race has put (the issue) on steroids.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: It has really amplified general public awareness, which was building.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: But it was building among the aware, kind of progressive grassroots,” Rubin said.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “This brought it into the mainstream in a big way.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Following Trump’s election, rank-and-file liberals in New Jersey – like many other largely Democratic states – rushed to enmesh themselves in local politics.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: But their ambitions were mostly thwarted.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Though New Jersey Democrats picked up US House seats in the 2018 midterms, the state seemed immune to an explosion of political insurgencies, typified not only by the rise of “The Squad” but also the ascent of younger female and minority candidates who sought to wrest power from what they viewed as an indifferent, self-serving establishment.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “The (Democratic newcomers) thought they were on the right team here and thought because they were Democrats, they had the ability to stand up and say proudly that they’re the party for democracy, especially in light of Trump being president,” said longtime progressive activist Sue Altman, a Democratic candidate for the state’s 7th Congressional District.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: But that initial optimism was blunted when “they found out that at the local level or the city level or the county level or the state legislative level, that their own beloved Democrats were not practicing ‘little d’ democracy,” Altman said.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text:
‘The line’ as ballast against the liberal grassroots

The complications facing would-be reformers in New Jersey were initially underscored by the state party’s lack of political turmoil.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Though hardly a machine choice, wealthy former Goldman Sachs executive and Democratic National Committee finance chair Phil Murphy won the governor’s office in 2017.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Over the next few years, as political insurgents like Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, across the river in New York, and Cori Bush in Missouri unseated longtime Democratic incumbents in races up and down the ballot, progressive groups largely bypassed New Jersey.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The state’s expensive media market and the bureaucratic barriers facing outsider campaigns made it an unwise place to spend precious resources.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “It is extremely difficult to engage in any kind of competitive primaries in New Jersey because at the end of the day, the winners are likely going to be chosen by the establishment,” said Ezra Levin, the co-founder and co-executive director of Indivisible.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Indivisible does not, like more confrontational groups including Justice Democrats, typically get involved in fraught primary fights.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Their membership, Levin said, is engaged on multiple policy fronts, from health care to immigration, “but the very top issue that they care about is democracy itself – this feeling that it was under threat and this sense that the Democratic Party when Trump got elected was not equipped to take on that threat.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Levin said that for Indivisible groups, the battle in New Jersey over “the line” has not been about a preference between Kim or Murphy, though the organization endorsed Kim.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “When I’m talking to our advocates, I will always say that the enemy isn’t MAGA, the enemy is cynicism and nihilism and fatalism,” Levin said.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “Corrupt systems like the ‘county line’ in New Jersey (is) an enemy because that dissuades folks from actually getting involved.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: And if folks don’t get involved, then we’ll lose.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: As the Murphy-Kim race heated up, interest in ending – or, among party leaders, defending – “the line” has also increased in size and intensity.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: A 2021 lawsuit, brought by and supported by a coalition of progressive Democrats, including Altman and the New Jersey Working Families Alliance, has been wending its way through the court system for years.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Kim speaks to delegates during the Bergen County Democratic convention in Paramus, New Jersey, on March 4, 2024.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: But for Kim, there was no time to waste.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: He effectively took up the old litigation late last month, using the same lawyers, in a bid to redesign the ballots before the June 4 primary.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: His request of the court, simply put, is for a federal judge to order that New Jersey follow all other states and group together candidates for any given office.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: On Monday, Kim testified in US District Judge Zahid Quraishi’s courtroom that he believed the current process “to be averse to the pursuit of democracy.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “I’m not asking for any advantage for me,” Kim told the court.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “All I’m asking for is for New Jersey to be in line with 49 other states in terms of pursuing an office block-style ballot that would allow us to have a fairer system here.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Though Kim has also won some county lines in this primary, and appeared on them during his own past races, the third-term congressman argued that a fundamentally unjust institution compelled him to play ball.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “Despite my personal concerns about how this went,” Kim said, “I felt I had no choice but to participate in the system.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The Murphy campaign, speaking before the candidate dropped out, took a dimmer view of Kim’s motivations.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text:
“Unfortunately, Congressman Kim’s focus has been on personal attacks and process,” said Murphy spokesperson Alexandra Altman, who has previously dismissed the lawsuit as a “hypocritical stunt.”

New Jersey first lady Tammy Murphy talks to reporters at the Bergen County Democratic convention in Paramus on March 4, 2024.

text:
Seth Wenig/AP

Kim campaign spokesperson Katey Sabo disputed that characterization, calling the line’s potential undoing “a critical issue in protecting our democracy.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The arguments against redrawing the ballots, at least in this case and the current discourse, are less high-minded, with the defendants in the suit – clerks from the 19 counties with county line ballots – contending that the changes sought by the plaintiff, Kim, would be too difficult to implement this late in the campaign-election calendar.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: (Ballots are printed and mailed out well before the June 4 primary date.)
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: A ruling is expected in the coming days or weeks.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Tammy Murphy, who is not involved in the case, had said she would follow the rules, regardless of the outcome.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text:
Altman, her spokesperson, told CNN that Kim’s strategy “does not help the real New Jerseyans struggling to make ends meet or protect their reproductive rights from being stripped away.”

Days of chaos
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: No matter how the judge decides in Kim’s last-ditch bid, “the line” appears to be on borrowed time.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Ahead of the hearing last week, New Jersey Attorney General Matt Platkin announced in a letter to the court that he would not defend the “challenged statutes,” calling them “unconstitutional.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: He will also drop out of the 2021 case, which remains in the judicial pipeline, after initially defending “the line.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The governor, under whom Platkin served as general counsel before being appointed to his current post, publicly disagreed with his longtime political ally, saying a defense of the system “would have been appropriate and consistent with the actions” of Platkin’s predecessors.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “Outside the context of any campaign, Governor Murphy has consistently and accurately noted that the bracketing of candidates is permitted by duly enacted laws that have been on the books for decades,” Murphy spokesman Mahen Gunaratna told CNN.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “It is well-established that Attorneys General have a general obligation to defend the constitutionality of statutes, regardless of their own personal views.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: That dust-up followed a weekend in which Kim had secured the backing of Democrats in Morris and Atlantic counties – where the process isn’t as tightly controlled by party leadership.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: In Camden County, where the local boss keeps a tighter grip, video of another Senate candidate, progressive Patricia Campos-Medina, being blocked from entering the county Democratic convention went viral.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Around the time Platkin’s memo went out, the Hoboken Democrats – who operate under the powerful Hudson County Democratic Organization, whose leader backed Tammy Murphy immediately upon her entering the race – announced that their own process had yielded a landslide victory for Kim.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Moments later, Hoboken Democratic Committee Chair Rachel Hodes announced her resignation, alleging harassment by Murphy allies and a “gross rejection of democracy” by the county group.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “Since we announced this (endorsement) meeting, I began receiving calls and emails denigrating and diminishing the integrity of our process,” Hodes wrote.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “Multiple senior advisors on the Tammy Murphy campaign called me to coerce me into changing our process, essentially calling it a sham.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: Both sides have acknowledged that a key sticking point was the Hoboken Democrats’ decision to solicit written statements from the candidates rather than inviting them to deliver their message in person.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: (Candidates were allowed to make more direct appeals to Hoboken committee voters.)
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The train kept rolling on Monday morning when, shortly before the federal court hearing began, Jersey City Mayor Steven Fulop, who is running to succeed Phil Murphy as governor in 2025, switched sides in the Senate primary and backed Kim.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “It’s no secret I’ve been disappointed with the (Tammy Murphy) campaign and how it has been conducted,” Fulop said in a statement, which also suggested the first lady consider bowing out of the race.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “I’ve expressed that over the last two months repeatedly both privately and publicly, and at this point, it’s clear to me that I was wrong with my early support and endorsement of Tammy Murphy for Senate.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: The growing backlash among ambitious officials underscored the rapidly changing tides of public opinion – and awareness.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: On Wednesday, in another sign of concern among brass from both parties (New Jersey Republicans also employ “the line” in their primaries), state Senate and Assembly leaders announced they would begin “a public process on ballot design in New Jersey, including a thorough and thoughtful review of other states, as well as a process that involves input from the public.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: But their statement also echoed other supporters of “the line,” insisting that the legislature – and not the courts – keep “the authority to determine the law regarding ballot design and the appropriate discretion used by county clerks.”
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: “We are prepared to work in a bipartisan manner to ensure public trust in a transparent and democratic process in New Jersey,” the leadership quartet said.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: For many Democrats in the Garden State, however, their words landed with a thud.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: How the court views the pledge, and whether it is taken into consideration, remains to be seen.
Article Title: How Donald Trump, Joe Biden and grassroots liberals could upend Democratic politics in one of the country’s bluest states

text: This story has been updated on Sunday to reflect Tammy Murphy’s suspension of her campaign.

CNN —

House Democrats may save Mike Johnson’s speakership – but he first must outline a pathway to approving aid to Ukraine, multiple Democratic sources told CNN.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: If Johnson were to announce he would take up the Senate’s $95 billion aid package, Democrats would vote in droves to keep him in the position, sources said.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Yet Johnson has already signaled an openness to a separate bipartisan plan emerging in the House, and he’d already told GOP lawmakers that he may schedule floor time on that plan when lawmakers return from their Easter recess.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: But that bipartisan plan has generated little Democratic enthusiasm, in large part because of its new border security restrictions, including reinstating the so-called “Remain in Mexico” policy.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Plus, Johnson has signaled a willingness to turn the Ukraine aid into a loan for the country, an idea floated by former President Donald Trump that has prompted Democratic skepticism.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: If Johnson tries to move on the House plan, Democrats may opt to save him but in smaller numbers, one Democratic source said.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: While the exact timing remains unclear, the first procedural vote to oust Johnson is expected to take the form of a “motion to table” – or kill – fellow Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene’s resolution to vacate the speakership.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Democrats are weighing whether to kill the resolution on the first procedural vote, but say they need to hear the speaker publicly outline his intentions on Ukraine aid.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “If he does the responsible thing, which is allowing members of Congress to vote on a bill that will pass and that is in our national security interests, and subsequent to that a non-serious actor that doesn’t want to govern brings a motion to vacate, yes I would motion to table in that circumstance,” Rep. Abigail Spanberger, a Virginia Democrat, told CNN.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: In a meeting Friday before Greene announced her intention to force a vote seeking Johnson’s ouster, the speaker already was telling Republicans he was ready to move on an aid package for Ukraine when they return.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: But it’s unclear what form that package will take.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “He said that’s going to come to the floor when we come back,” Rep. Greg Pence, an Indiana Republican, told CNN after meeting with Johnson on Friday morning.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text:
“And I think that’s good.”

Republicans warn Greene’s move could cost them the House

Several House Republicans have also warned that Greene’s move to oust Johnson could cost them the House in November, though some hardliners are weighing whether they would ultimately vote to remove him.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Greene, for her part, indicated Sunday that she may not even force a vote this Congress.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “I filed this motion to vacate but I haven’t called it,” she said on Fox News.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “(I’m) giving our conference notice saying that we have got to find a new speaker.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: This may take weeks, it may take months, it may not even happen until next Congress.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: But Speaker Johnson cannot remain as Speaker of the House.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Greene did not call up her resolution before the House left for a two-week recess on Friday, which means the two-legislative-day clock to force a vote has not yet started.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: It is ultimately up to Greene when and whether she forces a vote.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Pence said the chaos in the House is “turning people off” politics.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “You know, when I go home, people are telling me they’re not following what’s going on here anymore because they are tired of it.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: And when I mentioned that on the floor this week, talking to my peers, they’re hearing the same thing,” he said.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “These games, not working together, it’s turning people off.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: And we want people to be engaged in politics and we’re working the wrong way.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Pressed on whether it could cost them the majority, Pence replied, “Oh, it surely could.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: It’s possible, right?
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text:
It’s not helpful.”

House Homeland Security Chair Mark Green, meanwhile, told CNN, “I’m disappointed.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: … I think it’s a distraction.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: We need to just – unfortunately this bill passed, and we’ve got a lot of other stuff now to do, some articles to walk over… we don’t need anything that’s going to disrupt that.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: He said he hoped Greene will ultimately decide not to call up her resolution for a vote.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “I don’t think we’ll let that happen this time.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: I mean, we’ll see how it goes, but I don’t think that’s going to happen.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: But Rep. Richard Hudson, the chair of the House Republican campaign arm, downplayed the damage another speaker’s fight could cause in an election year.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “I just don’t think people out there in the real world, outside of this bubble we’re standing in right now, care as much about who the speaker of the House is as they do about how expensive it is to buy the things they need for their family,” he said.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “We are going to grow this House majority despite things that go on the House floor day to day.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: He argued that “Speaker Johnson is going to remain speaker” despite the threat to oust him.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “The House has to have a speaker to function.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: So, we need a speaker and I think Speaker Johnson has been an outstanding speaker and I stand behind him.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: I think we’ll get through this,” he added.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Some hardliners are weighing whether they will vote to oust Johnson once it is brought up.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “I’m open to that conversation,” said Rep. Eli Crane, one of the eight Republicans who voted to oust former Speaker Kevin McCarthy last fall.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Rep. Chip Roy on Sunday appeared reluctant to support Greene’s motion to vacate.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: But Roy did say “Mike was wrong” for not allotting members a full 72 hours to consider the funding package.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “I opposed the use of the motion to vacate against Kevin McCarthy, very openly and very loudly against my right-flank colleagues and everybody across the entire body,” the Texas Republican told CNN’s Jake Tapper on “State of the Union.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: But Roy declined to directly say whether he would support his former House Freedom Caucus colleague’s motion, instead slamming the media for focusing on “inside-the-Beltway palace drama.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Rep. Ralph Norman indicated that he was still considering it as well.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “We’ll see what happens.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Look, I take this minute by minute,” he said.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Pressed on whether he was comfortable overthrowing their leadership at this point, Norman replied, “I’m not saying that.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Let’s see how we come out on this bill.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Let’s see what he does, and we’ll go from there.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text:
He added, “Anything’s possible.”

McCarthy on Sunday urged Johnson to “not be fearful” of a potential vote to oust him from the speakership.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “I do not think they could do it again,” McCarthy said on CBS’ “Face the Nation.”
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “I don’t think the Democrats will go along with it too,” McCarthy added.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: “Focus on the country.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Focus on the job you’re supposed to do, and actually do it fearlessly.
Article Title: House Democrats want Speaker Johnson to outline path on Ukraine aid before agreeing to save his job

text: Just move forward.”

text:
CNN —

Former Republican National Committee chairwoman Ronna McDaniel on Sunday called the January 6, 2021, attack on the US Capitol “unacceptable” after years of deflecting on the issue.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: McDaniel, who is joining NBC News as a political analyst after exiting the RNC earlier this month, told the outlet that the Capitol riot “doesn’t represent our country.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: It certainly does not represent my party.”
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: “We should not be attacking the Capitol; we should not be having violence,” she added.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: Asked why she didn’t offer such condemnation as RNC chairwoman, McDaniel responded, “When you’re the RNC chair, you kind of take one for the whole team.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: Right now, I get to be a little bit more myself.”
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: McDaniel’s RNC exit comes amid a period of rising tensions between Donald Trump, the GOP presidential front-runner, and the RNC.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: Trump and his team had been disappointed with the RNC’s finances, with the committee experiencing one of its most anemic years of fundraising in the last decade.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: The former president also believed that the RNC under McDaniel’s leadership should have done more to fight for his candidacy in the 2020 election, including retaining better lawyers to push the former president’s false claims of rampant voter fraud.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: Trump, McDaniel said Sunday, “absolutely wanted me to move aside and wanted Michael Whatley and Lara Trump to come in.”
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: McDaniel said that while her role required her to remain neutral regarding GOP candidates, tensions rose with the Trump campaign when the former president decided to forgo this cycle’s primary debates.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: “We had debates, and there was tension and a little friction that started during that process.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: It was well played out in the media,” McDaniel said.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: “And I knew at that point, when I was doing that role, and we were going to have debates, that when the nominee came forward, and it was likely to be President Trump, that they were going to switch and that’s his right as nominee.”
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: News of McDaniel’s hiring at NBC has drawn sharp backlash.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: She has a long history of assailing the news media as “fake” and her promotion of false claims around the 2020 elections.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: As RNC chair, she was involved in a phone call in 2020 to pressure Michigan county officials not to certify the vote from the Detroit area, where Joe Biden had a commanding lead.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: McDaniel told the officials, regarding the certification: “Do not sign it.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: … We will get you attorneys.”
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: The Michigan Department of State’s office condemned her claims of supposed voter fraud in the wake of the election, stating they had “no merit.”
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: The state’s “elections were conducted fairly, effectively and transparently and are an accurate reflection of the will of Michigan voters,” it said in a detailed fact check posted online.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: McDaniel acknowledged Sunday that Biden won the 2020 election “fair and square” even as she voiced concern over “issues” with the vote.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: “I believe that both can be true,” she said.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: Asked about the criticism of her RNC tenure, and the blame some have placed on her for a slate of Republican losses, McDaniel said, “I push back on that very hard.”
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: “Under my time as chair, we’ve had more women in Congress ever than in the history of our party … we’ve had more minority growth in our party, and that didn’t just happen.”
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

text: CNN’s Oliver Darcy, Kaitlan Collins, Daniel Strauss, Michelle Shen and Avery Lotz contributed to this report.
Article Title: Former RNC chair McDaniel calls January 6 Capitol attack ‘unacceptable’ after years of deflection

CNN —

With its striking coloration, the giant panda is an instantly recognizable species.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: A handful of giant pandas that aren’t black-and-white, however, do exist.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: These majestic creatures with brown-and-white fur inhabit a single mountain range in China.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: And now, scientists may have unraveled the mystery of the extremely rare pandas’ unusual coats, according to new research.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The work, which involved studying the genetics of multiple pandas in the wild and in captivity, has suggested that pandas with brown-and-white coats are the result of natural variation, rather than a sign of inbreeding in a dwindling population.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The first brown panda known to science was a female named Dandan.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: A local ranger found the ailing bear in Foping County in Shaanxi province’s
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Qinling Mountains in March 1985.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The panda was held in captivity until her death in 2000.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text:
Since Dandan’s discovery decades ago, there have been 11 reported sightings documented through official news sources or personal accounts shared with the authors of this latest study that appeared in the journal PNAS on March 4.

“The recurring instances of brown pandas imply that this trait may be inheritable.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: However, to date, the genetic basis underlying the brown-and-white coat color remains unclear,” the authors wrote.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Gaining a better understanding of the distinctive coloration could help inform efforts to breed brown-and-white pandas in captivity, said senior author Dr. Fuwen Wei, a professor of wildlife ecology and conservation biology at the Chinese Academy of Sciences’ Institute of Zoology in Beijing.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The status of the giant panda as a species is vulnerable, according to the International Union for Conservation of Nature Red List of Threatened Species.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: A wild giant panda in China's Qinling Mountains stares at the camera in March 2016.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text:
Xinhua/Shutterstock

A panda family tree

To understand what lies behind the trait, the researchers studied Qizai, a male brown panda rescued as a cub in 2009 from Foping National Nature Reserve in Hanzhong.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: He is currently the only brown panda in captivity.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: When compared under a microscope with hair samples from three black-and-white pandas, Qizai’s brownish fur had fewer and smaller melanosomes, tiny structures found in cells that are responsible for skin and hair pigment in mammals.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: What’s more, the melanosomes were more likely to be irregularly shaped, the study team found.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The researchers then gathered genetic information about Qizai and pieced together his family tree.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Fresh scat, or bear poop, gathered at the nature reserve revealed the identity of his wild mother, a black-and-white female panda that wears a tracking collar and is known as Niuniu.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The researchers also identified Qizai’s son, a black-and-white panda born in captivity in 2020.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: (The study team later identified Qizai’s father, Xiyue, a wild but tracked black-and-white panda, by studying the genetics of a wider population of pandas.)
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The scientists studied the genetic information from Qizai’s family members and compared it with the genetic information from 12 black-and-white pandas from the Qinling Mountains and 17 black-and-white pandas from other regions in China using information taken from scat and blood samples.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: While none of Qizai’s immediate family members had brown fur, the researchers were able to show that his parents and son all had one copy of the recessive trait on a gene known as Bace2, while Qizai had two copies.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: An individual’s genes can carry recessive traits, such as blue eyes or red hair in humans, without appearing as a physical characteristic.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Each parent must possess a copy of the genetic variant and pass it on in order for the trait to appear in the offspring, as is the case with Qizai.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text:
Genetic analysis solves an enigma

Thanks to an analysis of a tissue sample stored for more than two decades in ethanol, the scientists also were able to sequence the genome of Dandan, the first known brown panda.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Dandan had the same recessive trait, the researchers found.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The scientists then conducted a wider analysis of 192 black-and-white giant pandas to verify the responsible gene as Bace2.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The mutation causing the brown coats was only present in two pandas hailing from the Qinling Mountains in Shaanxi, not Sichuan province, where the majority of China’s giant pandas live.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: To confirm the findings, the scientists used the CRISPR-Cas9 gene-editing tool to delete the genetic sequence they had identified as causing the mutation in the Bace2 gene in 78 lab mice.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The change reduced the number and size of melanosomes in the mice.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: “The coat color of knockout mice is light brown,” said Wei, who is also president at Jiangxi Agricultural University in Nanchang in China’s Jiangxi province.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: “It proves that this deletion has the potential to alter the coat color of a mouse, as the pigmentation pathway is relatively conserved (shared) among mammals.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text:
Therefore, it is very likely that this mutation influences the coat color of a brown panda.”

Natural variation vs. inbreeding

It’s not clear what caused the genetic mutation.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Wei said it must be linked to the specific environment of the Qinling Mountains, which has a different climate than Sichuan.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: The genetic mutation did not appear to be a result of inbreeding, as once suspected, he said.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: “It is more likely to be a result of natural variation rather than inbreeding.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Our kinship analysis indicates that Qizai’s parents are not closely related,” Wei added.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Tiejun Wang, an associate professor in the department of natural resources at the University of Twente in the Netherlands, said it was good news that the unique coloration did not appear to be the result of inbreeding.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Wang, who has studied brown pandas, was not involved in the study.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: “For those who are concerned about this species, this is a positive development,” said Wang, who said he worked as a field ranger in the mountains for 10 years.
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

text: Wang said he applauded the team “for their tremendous efforts in trying to shed light on this scientific question.”
Article Title: Pandas come in different shades, and scientists now understand why

Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Our eight-part guide shows you a delicious expert-backed eating lifestyle that will boost your health for life.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text:
CNN —

My love affair with small appliances started at an early age.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: The Easy-Bake Oven was my first glimpse of what magic could come from a miniature box, leading to a few experiments with microwave cooking — think nachos and Rice Krispie Treat bowls—during my latchkey kid years.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: And the minute I got my own off-campus apartment in college, I invested in my very own toaster oven.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Twenty-something years later, toaster oven technology has moved far beyond the analog dial and hot coils of my first model.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: But my small oven love remains strong, and it’s the most-used appliance in my daily life.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: The word “oven” is crucial in its name because it does everything my full-size conventional oven can do and more.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: In fact, it’s not just a toaster oven; it’s a countertop oven.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: If I had to choose to keep only one of my kitchen toys — the high-speed blender, the stand mixer, the compressor ice-cream maker, the multicooker — the countertop oven would likely come out on top.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: (OK, I admit it would be difficult to give up the stand mixer.)
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: That’s how deep my commitment to my countertop oven reaches.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Here’s why.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text:
The toaster oven is the original multitasker

Instead of having multiple appliances crowding my countertop, the countertop oven does the work of many.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: It toasts bread and bagels, sure, but it also has the capability to do convection baking, air frying, dehydrating and dough proofing.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Its broiler is spacious enough and functions so much more effectively than my oven’s broiler that I don’t even risk throwing out my back to shove sheet pans into the drawer underneath the full-size oven.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: (Who designed these bottom broiler drawers, anyway?)
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: My countertop oven is also my secret weapon in the fight for better leftovers.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: When I create a monthly meal plan, I’m always planning to reheat half of what I’m cooking, so this is a crucial function.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: And because most dishes taste better when they’re not zapped in a microwave, I let my countertop oven restore my meals to their original crispy, bubbly texture.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: No more soggy cutlets or mushy pasta casseroles in this house!
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: A countertop oven is
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text:
a quick fix

Yes, I understand that a countertop oven will never heat food as quickly as the one-minute express cook button on a microwave can.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: But I’ll argue that the taste trade-offs are worth it, and that you’ll still be heating food and cooking more quickly than you would in a large conventional oven.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: My countertop oven preheats to 450 degrees Fahrenheit (232 degrees Celsius) in five minutes (I’ve timed it), whereas my full-size oven takes 15 minutes to reach the same temperature.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: That’s a big difference — I can be done eating my leftover-but-perfectly-heated pizza in those 10 minutes!
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Moreover, the convection and air-fry functions on my countertop oven cook food more quickly and efficiently than conventional heat, since the convection method circulates hot air around the food for a more even heat distribution.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: I can shave at least five minutes off my baking and roasting times every time I make meals in my countertop oven.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: When the decades-old range in our kitchen finally went to the big scrap pile in the sky a few years ago, I refused to replace it with a high-end model.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: My top-of-the-line countertop oven cost half as much as the range we purchased, and I use it twice as often.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text:
It’s a summer savior

I’ll never forget the process of testing my first cookbook, “Classic Snacks Made from Scratch,” during a sweltering New Jersey summer.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: It was July, and I was working on various recipes for homemade crackers, which meant keeping my oven on for hours — in a house without central air-conditioning.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: In between batches, I laid on my kitchen floor, sweating and crying, wondering why I was voluntarily putting myself through such torture.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: I still don’t have central air, but thankfully, I’m not regularly tasked with developing and testing multiple baked goods every day of the week.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: For everyday summer baking and roasting, however, I’ll use my countertop oven, which gives off much less heat than my full-size oven and cools down much more quickly once its cooking cycle is finished.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: If I want to bake some goodies that require my larger baking sheets or multiple sheet pans, I’ll simply bake on my grill.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: What to look for in a countertop oven
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: So, I’ve convinced you to ditch all your other appliances and replace them with a countertop oven.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Great!
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text:
But before you rush out to buy one, think about what oven best suits your cooking habits.

Choose a model that can fit your everyday cookware and bakeware.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: My countertop oven is deep and wide enough to fit a standard 9-by-13-inch (23-by-33-centimeter) casserole dish or sheet pan or a 10-inch (25-centimeter) round baking pan or cast-iron skillet.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: This means I can cook meals for up to six or eight people in one little appliance.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Yes, choosing a smaller oven can be tempting when it comes to keeping your kitchen looking open and tidy.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: For the most versatility, however, I’d recommend going with the largest model that can comfortably fit the space you’re planning to use it in.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Your foods need the air circulating around them in the oven to cook most efficiently, so having a space that’s too small to allow that won’t be doing you any favors.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Consider what extra functions you’ll need.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: As I noted earlier, my countertop oven comes with a lot of bells and whistles — including a few functions I don’t even bother using.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: I’ve never tried the slow cook function, for instance, even though it’s there.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Some models come with wi-fi functionality so you can control them via an app.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Decide if these things are worth the money to you.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven

text: Casey Barber is a food writer, artist and editor of the website Good Food Stories.
Article Title: Ditch your air fryer and replace it with a countertop oven
