Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text:
Hong Kong/Beijing CNN —

Tim Cook is making a high-profile visit to China that coincides with Apple opening a huge new store in Shanghai — its second biggest in the world.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: It’s all part of a push by the company to reverse a decline in iPhone sales in its most important international market.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: The new $11.6 million outlet — located in Shanghai’s central district of Jing’an, which is named after a historic temple — is the biggest in China and the second only to Apple’s flagship store on New York’s Fifth Avenue, Chinese state media reported.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: Apple CEO Cook said in a Weibo post on Wednesday, which means “hello” in Shanghainese.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “I’m always so happy to be back in this remarkable city.”
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text:
Cook said he had spent the morning enjoying a traditional breakfast of what appeared to be soup dumplings and soy milk and taking selfies along the city’s famous Bund waterfront with local actor Zheng Kai.

In Shanghai, mainland China’s financial hub, Apple now has eight stores, the largest number of any city in the country.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: There are currently 47 Apple stores in 24 cities across mainland China.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: The new addition comes as Apple (AAPL) tries to fend off competitors and revive sales in a rocky market with growing headwinds, ranging from an economic slowdown to geopolitical tensions and rising nationalist sentiment.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: In 2023, Apple grabbed the top spot in China’s smartphone market for the first time ever, with a record 17.3% market share, according to IDC Research.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: But during the first six weeks of 2024, iPhone sales in the country slumped 24% from a year ago, according to a separate report by Counterpoint Research from earlier this month.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: Apple’s market share slid behind that of Vivo, Huawei, and Honor in that period, it added, while rival Huawei’s sales soared 64%.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: Cook’s visit, his third to the country in a year, underscores China’s significance to Apple as its biggest overseas market and a critical part of its manufacturing supply chain.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “China remains a critical market for Apple, particularly in the premium segment above $800, where it holds a dominant position,” said Ivan Lam, senior analyst from Counterpoint.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “With Huawei’s resurgence and other Chinese [phone makers] gaining traction in offline sales, Apple is proactively strengthening its offline presence, leveraging flagship stores as a key tool to promote high-end smartphones,” he said.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: Earlier this month, Apple announced it would expand its research center in Shanghai to support all of its product lines and unveiled plans to open a new applied research lab in Shenzhen later this year.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “China is the heart and lungs of Apple’s growth strategy as Cupertino doubles down on its China strategy with these moves,” said Daniel Ives, managing director and senior equity analyst at Wedbush Securities.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text:
No supply chain ‘more critical’

On Wednesday, Cook hosted an information sharing session along with three of Apple’s suppliers — BYD, Lens Technology and Everwin Precision Technology — at its Shanghai office, according to state media reports.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “There’s no supply chain in the world more critical to Apple than that of China,” Cook told a group of reporters.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: He met with Wang Chuanfu, founder and chairman of BYD, the world’s largest electrical vehicle maker, at the session, according to a video he posted on his Weibo account.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: Cook praised Chinese suppliers as having “the most advanced manufacturing in the world,” according to China Daily.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: The Apple CEO also visited a film production studio, talked with mobile game developers and took photos with a crowd of shoppers and staff, according to his social media posts.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “Cook is not taking a step back from China.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: It’s the opposite as competition from Huawei ramps up domestically,” Ives said.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text:
A woman compares an iPhone 15 Pro and a Huawei Mate 60 Pro. ALY SONG/X01793/REUTERS

Apple still has many fans in the country.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: More than a hundred of them waited in line overnight to be among the first to enter the new store or to get a photo with Cook, according to videos and state media reports circulated on Weibo.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: Others told CNN they were planning to go.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “I’ll go and kinda ‘worship’ the store,” said Dolores, a movie producer in Beijing.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: She has been using the iPhone, iPad and MacBook for years.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “I’ve already grown used to its design and the system,” she said, calling the products “sleek and beautiful.”
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: Wei, a Beijing resident, also said he would visit.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “I’ve heard that it’s quite big,” he said.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “I just want to have a look.”
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: Both said they would stay loyal to the brand, despite rising calls on the Chinese internet for consumers to switch to homegrown brands to show their patriotism.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “Some Chinese brands like Huawei are also doing well with their products.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: But [I won’t switch.]
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: It should be about mutual achievement [for Apple and Chinese brands], rather than hostility,” Dolores said.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “For international products, if you like a brand, there should be no geopolitical divisions,” Wei said.
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

text: “Just look at the products.”
Article Title: Apple’s Tim Cook goes on China charm offensive to revive flagging iPhone sales

Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: CNN retains full editorial control over subject matter, reporting and frequency of the articles and videos within the sponsorship, in compliance with our policy.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text:
CNN —

In a country best known for its soaring skyscrapers, modern architecture and sprawling desert, wildlife isn’t always what comes to mind when people think of the United Arab Emirates (UAE).
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: But Dubai-based photographer Anish Karingattil is determined to change that.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: Originally from India, Karingattil moved to Dubai 17 years ago and began photographing wildlife shortly after, specializing in macro photography, using extreme close ups.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: Highlights of his stunning portfolio of images, taken across the seven Emirates, include a scorpion with her babies, an Arabian horned viper hiding in the desert sand, and two black and yellow mud daubers covered in dew drops.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: “Photographers get to tell a story through images,” Karingattil says.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: “Macro photography allows me to see life and the world around me in a brand-new way.”
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: Despite its hot climate and harsh desert, the UAE is home to over 1,000 plant and animal species.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: The waters around the country are home to the largest concentration of Indian Ocean humpbacks dolphin in the world, and the second-largest population of dugongs, after Australia.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: With the UAE’s president recently extending the country’s “Year of Sustainability” into 2024, Karingattil uses wildlife photography as a method of capturing the country’s biodiversity and sharing it with others.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: While interior design is his full-time job, “herping” is his passion.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: “Herping is the act of observing, studying, and photographing reptiles and amphibians in their natural habitats,” says Karingattil.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: “It is a popular hobby among nature enthusiasts and wildlife photographers who are fascinated by the diversity and beauty of these creatures.”
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: Some snakes found in the UAE, including this saw-scaled viper, are aggressive and highly venomous.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: But photographing potentially dangerous animals like snakes and spiders takes a lot of preparation.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: Before attempting to photograph any wildlife, Karingattil says it is important to research its behavior, habitat and potential risks to understand how to approach it safely and minimize the risk of harm to both the photographer and the animal.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: For Karingattil, conservation is an important aspect of wildlife photography, which he believes can serve as a powerful tool for advocacy.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: “By documenting the beauty and fragility of the natural world, photographers can help policymakers and the general public understand the value of protecting the environment and the need for sustainable practices,” he says.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: And with over 69,000 followers on Instagram, Karingattil uses social media to educate people about the species he photographs.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text:
Biodiversity in the UAE

The UAE has 49 terrestrial and marine protected areas, including eight in Dubai.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: Accounting for over 18% of the country’s land territory and 12% of its marine and coastal territory, these protected areas are often natural reserves which include all the major ecosystems found in the region: mountain, desert, coastal and marine.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: Andrew Gardner, associate director of Biodiversity Conservation at Emirates Nature-WWF, says wildlife conservation is recognized as an “important responsibility and obligation by the UAE.”
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: For example, the country is a signatory to multiple international conservation conventions, such as the Convention on Biological Diversity, and has helped reintroduce animals such as the Arabian oryx to the Arabian Peninsula.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: According to Gardner, there are now over 1,600 oryx in two of the UAE’s protected areas, and thousands more in zoos across the region.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: However, rapid development and population growth across the Emirates mean that “53% of bird species, 46.7% of mammal species, 19% of reptile species, and 8% of plant species” are endangered, according to a government report.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: It was Karingattil's long-term desire to photograph a scorpion, so when he came across this scorpion with her babies, he couldn't let the chance pass by.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text:
Anish Karingattil

Gardner says the Arabian wolf and striped hyena have both gone extinct from the UAE in recent decades, and a small population of Arabian leopards that lived the Hajar Mountains until the mid-1990s are now also believed to be extinct.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: Karingattil points to habitat loss, climate change and overfishing as some of the major threats facing wildlife in the UAE, but one issue he thinks people should take more action against is plastic pollution.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: “Whenever I explore the desert or other areas, I make it a point to clean up the surroundings,” he says.
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

text: “By removing litter and debris, we can reduce the impact of human activities on the natural world.”
Article Title: Dubai photographer reveals the UAE’s hidden wildlife

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text:
CNN —

Dubai is set to add another towering figure to its skyline.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: The Aeternitas Tower, officially unveiled at a launch event last week, will be the world’s tallest residential clock tower at a staggering 450 meters (1,476 feet) tall — more than four times the height of London’s Big Ben, and just 22 meters (72 feet) short of the world’s tallest residential building, the Central Park Tower in New York City.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: Set to become the world’s second-tallest clock tower (after the Makkah Clock Royal Tower in Mecca, Saudi Arabia), Aeternitas Tower is the result of a partnership between Dubai-based real estate developer London Gate and Swiss luxury watch manufacturer Franck Muller.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: London Gate purchased the plot of land in Dubai Marina, which already had the beginnings of an unfinished 106-story structure — and knew that the tower’s monumental size needed a striking facade, said Tom Hill, media relations coordinator for the developer.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: “We believe the clock will be seen from six kilometers away because of the sheer height of the building,” said Hill, adding that the clock face will be an enormous 40 meters (131 feet) tall and 30 meters (98 feet) wide.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: “We wanted to do something different that hasn’t been done before in Dubai,” said Hill.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text:
At 450 meters (1,476 feet) tall, the residences will tower over the neighboring skyscrapers in Dubai Marina and will replace Marina 101 as the city's second-tallest building London Gate

A timeless tower
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: The residential tower comprises 649 units, with a mix of one- to three-bedroom apartments, in addition to villa and mansion duplexes.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: With housekeeping, a concierge service, and a 24-hour valet and porter, residents will have access to hotel-like services and facilities, but with the privacy and comfort of home.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: Its shared amenities range from health facilities, including a gym, padel court, spa, yoga studio, and swimming pool, to arts and culture spaces such as a cinema, music room, and library.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: The project will be handed over to residents in 2027, according to London Gate.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: The tower’s name means “eternity” in Latin, and is inspired by the Franck Muller Aeternitas watch collection — one of the brand’s most complex designs which features an “eternal calendar,” said Erol Baliyan, managing director of Franck Muller in the Middle East and Africa.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: The Aeternitas Tower will have amenities for residents such as gym, yoga studio, cinema, and swimming pool, pictured in this digital rendering.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text:
London Gate

The Swiss watchmaker sees its step into real estate as a move that will help create a monument that “mirrors the brand’s innovation, craftsmanship, and timeless elegance,” said Baliyan.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: Aside from the striking clock face (inspired by Franck Muller’s art deco-style Long Island Collection, which has irregular squashed and stretched numbers in a rectangular case), the watchmaker will infuse its design ethos throughout the residence, said Baliyan.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: He highlights luxury materials like brushed and polished metals, that will be contrasted with marble surfaces, textured fabrics and bold colors.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: Meanwhile, in the lobby and reception, the signature oblong face of the brand’s Curvex watch is represented with curved walls, archways, and oval furnishings.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: “Attention to detail is paramount, with meticulously crafted joinery and carefully arranged lighting and furniture, ensuring a refined ambiance,” said Baliyan.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: A digital rendering shows the living space of one of the tower's luxury duplexes.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text:
London Gate

A booming market

The Aeternitas Tower is part of a growing trend in Dubai.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: Luxury property is booming in the Emirate, and branded residences — collaborations between designer brands and property developers — are surging in popularity.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: As of October 2023, there were 51 completed projects in the city, a figure that is expected to double by 2030, according to Savills Research, with brands like fashion house Karl Lagerfeld, car manufacturer Mercedes-Benz, and hoteliers 25Hours all announcing residential projects in the past year.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: London Gate began phase one of its sales last week, with one-bedroom apartments starting at AED 1.6 million ($435,600).
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: “We’ve had an unbelievable level of interest since the launch,” said Hill, adding that in the first two days, London Gate sold around 30% of the initial 30-floor release, including all the available one-bedroom apartments.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: The design for Aeternitas Tower was officially unveiled at a launch event on January 9 2024, at the Ritz-Carlton Dubai (pictured).
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text:
London Gate

Hill believes that one factor driving interest is the tower’s location in Dubai Marina, where there’s a scarcity of sites for development, adding that an “iconic tower” like the Aeternitas is the first project of its kind to break ground in the district past few years.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: While this is London Gate’s first branded residence project, it won’t be its last, said Hill, adding that the company will announce its next branded partnership by the end of Q1 this year.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: As a rapidly evolving market, property in Dubai is often sold off-plan, with buyers waiting years to see their purchase.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: This is where branded residences provide an extra layer of security, particularly for overseas buyers, said Hill.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: “When you have a brand as world-renowned as Franck Muller, for example […] you have that peace of mind that you’re going to be handed over a world-class product,” he added.
Article Title: Aeternitas Tower: Dubai is building the world’s tallest residential clock tower

text: Architect Tosin Oshinowo is no stranger to versatility.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: She has designed one of the largest malls in Lagos, Nigeria, beach houses on the city’s coast and homes for internally displaced people in the north of the country.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: She also runs a bespoke furniture design company, and the Nigerian is the first African woman to curate the Sharjah Architecture Triennial, happening in the United Arab Emirates from November 2023 to March 2024.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: In late 2022, she and her design practice, cmDesign Atelier (cmDA), also completed their first residential project in the ultra-exclusive Banana Island neighborhood in Lagos: “The Lantern House.”
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text:
Oshinowo says the Lantern House project, a five-bedroom, seven-bathroom, three-story sustainable home, powered entirely by solar energy, was both exciting and a “slow labor of love.”

Contacted by her clients in September 2020, she, alongside her team and specialist contractors for various aspects of the home, started construction in January 2021 and ended last October.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text:
Working on Banana Island

The 1.6 million-square meter (17 million-square feet), man-made Banana Island is named for its shape, and is a private, gated community in Nigeria’s commercial capital.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: (The exclusive area also made news in April, when a seven-story building under construction collapsed – adding to the list of building collapses in the greater Lagos State.)
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: With private power and water infrastructure systems, property on the island is some of the most expensive on the continent.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: That exclusivity was one of the main challenges for the Lantern House project, says Oshinowo, with strictly enforced restricted working hours that made looming deadlines difficult to meet.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: Designed by Nigerian architect Tosin Oshinowo, the "Lantern House" is a private residence in the elite Banana Island community in Lagos, Nigeria.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text:
Tolulope Sanusi/Rubyspolaroid Photography/cmDesign Atelier

Despite this, Oshinowo says seeing her vision come to life was fulfilling, adding that she’s proud of the end result.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: “It’s one thing to produce great conceptual design.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: It’s another thing to execute it to a seamless finish,” she said.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: “It’s such an exciting feeling to think that the decisions that you’ve made have worked.”
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: She says something the Lantern House project emphasized for her is that “being meticulous in the long run always pays off.”
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: cmDA has since started working on another project on Banana Island.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text:
A childhood dream

Oshinowo remembers wanting to be an architect from the age of 12, looking over floor plans and helping her father to design part of their holiday home when she was young.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: With degrees in architecture and urban design from the UK as well as an MBA in architecture, she worked for architecture firms in the UK and Europe before moving back to Nigeria in 2009.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: The Lantern House features five bedrooms and seven bathrooms, and large wardrobes such as this one.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text:
Tolulope Sanusi/Rubyspolaroid Photography/cmDesign Atelier

The award-winning architect says she founded cmDA in 2012 out of a need to create a strong aesthetic language; one that also projected a contemporary and progressive cultural identity of Africa.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: “(It’s) very important to create architecture that, as much as possible, can be delivered from what is available in country,” Oshinowo added.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: “And also in doing that, starting to think about issues to do with sustainability and responsibility towards the environment.”
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: This bent towards sustainability is something the 43-year-old has carried into her curatorial role for this year’s upcoming Sharjah Architecture Triennial.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: The theme Oshinowo came up with is “The beauty of impermanence and the architecture of adaptability” which, she says, looks at under-celebrated innovations in the global south that deal with conditions of scarcity.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: She adds that she hopes the triennial will be an engaging space for the international community.
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

text: “It’s a validation to know that coming from Nigeria, practicing as a Black female architect in West Africa, that my work is not just relevant to the context of where we find ourselves now,” Oshinowo said, “in terms of importance relating to sustainability (and) adaptability, but also to equity.”
Article Title: Tosin Oshinowo on building a sustainable house in one of the world’s most exclusive neighborhoods

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text:
CNN —

Dubai is making a splash with its most recent record-setting structure.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The newly opened twin skyscrapers One Za’abeel are home to the world’s longest cantilever building and on it, the United Arab Emirates’ longest suspended infinity pool, which is 120 meters (393 feet) in length.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: A cantilever is a structure that is only connected at one end, and projects horizontally unsupported, like a diving board.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The one at One Za’abeel is part of a 230-meter-long (755-foot) structure known as “The Link,” with the cantilever projecting 67.5 meters (221 feet) over the city.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The Link connects the luxury development’s two towers, providing a space for shared facilities and lifestyle amenities, says Fadi Jabri, CEO of Nikken Sekkei Dubai, the architecture firm behind the building.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: “Levitating in the air,” the giant glass corridor is an engineering marvel — but it’s not just for show, says Jabri.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The site is bisected by a six-lane highway, which meant building facilities at ground level was not possible, and “there was this need to rejoin those sites,” he explains.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The property’s developers negotiated the use of the space below and above the road, allowing them to connect the two towers with a shopping mall beneath the road, and the Link above.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The 120-meter-long (394-feet) pool at The Link is the UAE's longest suspended infinity pool.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text:
International © Hufton + Crow

Twenty-five meters (82 feet) high and wide, the cantilever contains three stories and is a key destination for the building’s hotel guests and residents, says Badr Benryane, director of food and beverage at the One&Only Za’abeel resort, which occupies the top 30 floors of one of the towers.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: “In the absence of a beach and other water-based activities, our guests will have The Link as their playground,” says Benryane.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: “It’s been inspired by the bustling streets of big cities around the world: it’s a futuristic boulevard, so as you walk down the middle of The Link, you will have different dining experiences.”
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The Link’s eight restaurants include Tapasake, a poolside Nikkei restaurant serving up Japanese-Peruvian dishes.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: “On one end, there’s the restaurant with a terrace and indoor seating, and on the other is the pool club where we have amazing VIP cabanas, loungers and daybeds,” says Benryane.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The pool is 100 meters off the ground — with nothing but a six-lane highway below.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text:
International © Hufton + Crow

Having taken a dip in the pool himself
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: , Benryane says it’s one of the highlights of the space.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: “You’re basically in that infinity pool with nothing below you,” he says, adding: “You’re swimming amongst the clouds and overlooking the city — it’s beautiful.”
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: Temperature regulated and featuring underwater speakers, the unique bathing spot is open to hotel guests and One Za’abeel residents, although tourists and Dubai residents can gain access with a pool day pass, starting from 1,000 dirhams ($272) per person, and going up to $10,000 for VIP cabanas that come equipped with their own sound system, air conditioning, showers, dining rooms and private garden.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: Dubai is home to several record-setting pools: in 2021, the Aura Skypool became the world’s highest 360-degree infinity pool, and the world’s tallest infinity pool inside a building is the 293.9-meter-high (964.2 feet) pool on the 77th floor of the Address Beach Resort in Dubai’s Jumeirah Gate.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: World's highest infinity pool: Dubai has another Guinness World Record to add to the pile.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: This rooftop oasis is the world's highest infinity pool inside a building.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: Courtesy Address Hotel + Resorts Jumeirah Gate:
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: The rooftop pool is part of the Address Beach Resort at Jumeirah Gate, a striking new building that opened on the Dubai seafront in December.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: Courtesy Address Hotel + Resorts Big bath: The pool is 1.2 meters deep at its deepest point and holds around 500 cubic meters of water.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: Courtesy Address Hotel + Resorts Zeta Seventy Seven: The pool is only open to hotel guests, but you can cop a load of the views while staying dry by visiting the Zeta Seventy Seven restaurant.

text: Courtesy Address Hotel + Resorts

text: Two world records: The skybridge connecting the top part of Jumeirah Gate is home to luxury apartments.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: At 294.36 meters (965.7 feet), it's the world's highest occupiable skybridge floor.
Article Title: The Link, Dubai: The UAE’s longest suspended infinity pool just opened on the world’s longest cantilever building

text: Courtesy Address Hotel + Resorts Bedroom: There are 217 guest rooms and suites in the hotel and close to 1,000 apartments in Address Beach Residences.
